explaination: ^You must be wondering why I'm here.
^More precisely, why I have come to existance very late.
response1: ^actually, why did Aiko turn this assignment in very late?
because: ^If only if you can see my true form.
reveal: ^Aiko drew a comic of me for her Chinese class's final project...
^... and gave me blonde hair and a birthmark due to copyright.
promotion: ^If you like reading webcomics or know others who do, please help Aiko and her dedicated team reach 50 plus subscribers on their story!
^They are called the Storytellers of Gen.Z or SGZ Club.
^If anything, you should follow them so that you can say you know them when they get famous.
